summary: Make Thirsk 4x the size than before.
descriptionHtml:
Do you wish that Thirsk was bigger thanÂ before. Well now it is. This make Thirsk 4x bigger which makes it feel more like a mead hall to live in with a bigger dinning table, library, wood chopping block station, tanning rack area, alchemy area and more nordic hall decor. The back room of the mead hall is now a new cell with storage, a living quarters and beds to rest in. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/997?]here[/url]. If your play Morrowind and have the Bloodmoon Expansion Pack also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/28917?]Bloodmoon Thirsk 2x[/url] mod.

Requirements
Skyrim
Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?]TES5LODGen[/url]

To install just download then extract folder and drag master file, plugin, and bsa into your data folder. Then Download and run [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?]TES5LODGen[/url] and run the application and check off DLC2SolstheimWorld in LODGen Options and then click on Generate. Make sure in the Data Files Load Order that Thirsk 4x.esm is after the Dragonborn.esm.
author: LegoManIAm94
